name: Boss Up
description:
Ghost Biker!

Controls are the arrow keys. The top track moves slower than the bottom.

This was made for Gameralla Game Jam November 2014. The theme was Boss Up! This is the unpolished snapshot of where we ended up at the end of the jam, it was built in Phaser.

The team was:

Code: @popularpixels, @edbles

Art: Khadijah Dellimore, Jonathan Tune

Audio: Nicholas Friedemann
